citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50 AM on July,
16th 2024. The inspector contacted the licensee by phone at 10:56 AM after knocking on the door and finding no one at
home. The licensee reported that she would not be able to be home till after she got off work at noon and then went to an
appointment at 1pm. At 11:54 AM the licensee called to say that her appointment had been moved but by that time the
inspector had left the area. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:50 AM on July, 
16th 2024. The inspector contacted the licensee by phone at 10:56 AM after knocking on the door and finding no one at 
home. The licensee reported that she would not be able to be home till after she got off work at noon and then went to an 
appointment at 1pm. At 11:54 AM the licensee called to say that her appointment had been moved but by that time the 
inspector had left the area. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious 
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
